data.name: Judo Line of Credit
data.description: Need a facility that provides a source of funds to draw as needed? Our Judo Bank line of credit can assist in managing the cash flow of your business. We can assist to meet your working capital needs by allowing drawings and repayments to match your cashflow.

features.additionalInfo: Variable interest rate based on our Judo Market Base Rate.
Security includes trading assets of your business and property.
Principal and interest, or interest-only repayments. Weekly fortnightly, monthly or quarterly repayment options available on principal and interest loans, to match your cashflow.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Domicile - your business must be registered in Australia
